Function reference

All functions

age_days()
Calculate Number of Days Between Two Dates
cc_multiple()
Search the Medicare Multiple Chronic Conditions API
cc_specific()
Search the Medicare Specific Chronic Conditions API
days_today()
Calculate Number of Days Between a Date and Today
format_zipcode()
Format US ZIP codes
monthly_enroll()
Search the Medicare Monthly Enrollment API
opt_out()
Search the Medicare Opt Out Affidavits API
order_refer()
Search the Medicare Order and Referring API
physician_by_service()
Search the Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners API by Provider and Service
provider_clia()
Search the Medicare Provider of Services File - Clinical Laboratories API
provider_luhn()
Checks NPI number for compliance with the Luhn algorithm
provider_mooa()
Search the Medicare Opt Out Affidavits API
provider_mpop()
Search the Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners API
provider_mpop_serv()
Search the Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners by Provider and Service API
provider_mppe()
Search the Medicare Fee-For-Service Public Provider Enrollment API
provider_mpstc()
Search the Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API
provider_mrdd()
Search the Medicare Revalidation Due Date API
provider_nppes()
Search the NPPES National Provider Identifier (NPI) Registry API
provider_promdci()
Search the CMS Public Reporting of Missing Digital Contact Information API
provider_rcgpr()
Search the Medicare Revalidation Clinic Group Practice Reassignment API
provider_unpack()
Unpack NPPES NPI Registry Search Results
